sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2010/L.12), adopted on 9 June, SBSTA, inter alia : requests the Secretariat to organize: a second workshop to address methodological issues relating to reporting when using the 2006 IPCC Guidelines for National Greenhouse Gas Inventories in October 2010; and a third workshop in the first half of 2011; invites the IPCC to organize an expert meeting to clarify methodological issues related to reporting on HWPs, wetlands and nitrous oxide emissions from soils; agrees that revision of Annex I reporting guidelines should be based on the current guidelines; and notes the need for capacity building to facilitate the use of the 2006 IPCC Guidelines.
